channel.title: Need some help with Client
channel.description:
Hello ppl :) I'm trying to make a Runescape private server for a first time :palm: and it goes bad :palm: :palm: I would like if some1 could add me on skype :gvidasa :palm: :palm: :palm: The problem is i downloaded like 6-7 Sources and everytime i open .Client i see same crap and everytime i search for Ip or cordinates of starting spot i can't find anything. even in one client when you needed to activate noclip you had to go inside .client and look for ChangeName i did CTRL+F and couldn't find it ://
Please contact me :))

item.title: Need some help with Client
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

Update your java and use my tutorial on setting environmental variables https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,557965.msg4081924.html#msg4081924

Read full topic

item.description:

You’re going to need to be more specific if you want to get some help.

so if you could help me trou screen share on skype that would be awesome

Hello ppl
